participant_1.background: i'm 13 years old. i ride the bus to school. my brother is older than me. i hate math class. i'm on the soccer team.

participant_2.background: i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman.
